item.title: Barnum Effect
item.description: The Barnum Effect is when people believe that vague and general statements about their personality or behaviour are accurate and personal to them.

item.title: Reverse Life Cycle
item.description: “I think the most unfair thing about life is the way it ends. I mean, life is tough. It takes up a lot of your time.

item.title: Eyeball Kick
item.description: [[Allen Ginsberg]] also made an intense study of haiku and the paintings of Paul CÃ©zanne, from which he adapted a concept important to his work, which he called the Eyeball Kick.

item.title: Today I Learnt
item.description: A collection of useful things I’ve learnt, as I learn them. Some of these tips are life-saving, some are fun.
